Name: The Perplexing Orb
About the game: Welcome to the world of The Perplexing Orb! Experience a puzzle platforming challenge like no other! Roll through over 60 single player stages collecting artifacts, navigating obstacles, and knocking over the finish post to achieve victory! Try your hand at regular, bonus, challenge, and brutal challenge levels.
